website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, and sports a solid overall performance, especially when you consider its price point.
pros: Can shoot either BBs or pellets
Contains numerous Picatinny rails for mounting accessories
cons: Not the most durable air rifle on the market

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Gun
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. When I got mine I was excited to shoot it. But the first day I got it was raining so I didn’t shoot it. So I added my acog scope and grip and got the little “magazine” ready. And the next day in 84 degree temperature at 10 yards shot at a target the size of a large dinner plate..... and MISSED!!! I thought it was the sight so I took it off and put the default on and shot still missed I got closer 5 yards now and shot right at the center. And it hit the very very edge of the target. I immediately knew it wasn’t me. So returned it and got other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Zuber

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these 3 years ago for my then 9 year old son and he loves it. It has worked flawlessly and shoots BB's and pellets without an issue. It is very accurate too. At this price for the kit I ordered another one for his younger brother. Swingga 5" bipod and AIM Sports 4x32 scope added.
customer_reviews.author: HowzitUSA

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Shoots well for a 4 yo
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Shoots well for a 4 yo. His 8 yo brother received a AR for Christmas so he thinks he has one as well
customer_reviews.author: KEGLIFE

customer_reviews.title: Nice airgun for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice airgun for the money. The rifle appears well made, the plastic is thick and seems robust, with the possible exception of the adjustable stock. With proper handling, especially while charging the pump, this rifle should last for many years. The style is great and the rifle feels hefty and well balanced. Accuracy is good with pellets, thanks to the rifled steel barrel. Shooting BBs will eventually wear out the rifling and reduce the rifle accuracy. All in all, an excellent air gun, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Abrate

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CROSMAN RIFLE, {PHOTOS ENCLOSED}
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT CROSMAN RIFLE LOOKS JUST LIKE THE REAL THING. *WHO EVER SAID* "IT DID NOT COME WITH A SCOPE" IS BLIND, LOOK AT THE PICTURE AGAIN, ITS A HANDLE, I GOT BOTH VERSIONS {PHOTOS ENCLOSED} I REMOVED THE SIGHTS ON THE 2nd ONE. DIDN'T NEED IT. IT SHOOTS STRONG AND STRAIGHT LIKE ME. AS OLD AS I AM WITH MY HONEY-BADGER HAIR, THESE M4-177 ARE EASY TO PUMP AND SHOOT. THANKS CROSMAN
customer_reviews.author: ROMAN V. HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Great gun, but inaccurate information of what is included
customer_reviews.text: The gun itself is great - lightweight, easy to hold and load. I gave the score I did for 2 reasons: The listing clearly states it includes 100 pellets and 100 bbs. It only came with 50 of each. Secondly, the 50 bbs sent are not at all compatible with this gun. They load in, but it never catches and pushes 1 through to shoot. I've had several people double check me.
customer_reviews.author: Jill V.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for plinking cans at close range
customer_reviews.text: This bb gun is surprisingly well built, it looks pretty cool, and is fairly accurate. It comes with comprehensive instructions for dialing in your sites. I recommend taking the time to do so, so it will increase you enjoyment...after all, it's always fun to put the projectile exactly where you want it to go. I would NOT use this for anything other than backyard target practice. The projectile velocity is hardly enough to make it through a single layer of thick card board, you will not be able to humanely dispatch any vermin with this (if you are considering it for that purpose).
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old grandson's birthday. I've never seen him so excited when I opened the box to show it to him! Went out in the back yard and learned how to use it. A little bit complicated at first and a little difficult to pump but could not wipe the smile off of his face! I was a real hero that day!
customer_reviews.author: bill werner

customer_reviews.title: Virutec Computer Repair Approved.
customer_reviews.text: I run a small computer repair store and only leave reviews on the things I feel meet expectations. I am giving this item a 5 star because It works great with no problems. We probably spend over $50,000 a year on Amazon for our business, so finding the right parts in a timely matter at an affordable price so I can make some profit is key. We rely on Amazon to keep us in stock with parts.
customer_reviews.author: Virutec Computer Repair

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice gun. Company is great too!!! Our scope wasn't in the box which I noticed Christmas Eve when I was setting it out from Santa and I emailed them that night (Christmas morning lol). They got the scope shipped right out to us!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing not one flaw totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to have a nice plinker to go outside with or take out some of those nasty crows this is a gun to do it it's shoot hard it looks cool and it's a lot of fun to learn the basics of shooting with it it's very accurate and suits every need just like a pellet rifle should and the ability to shoot BBS with it for practice instead of using expensive pellets it just one of the perks if you're looking for a pump gun go ahead and get one of these
customer_reviews.author: El j.

customer_reviews.title: Airsoft guns are deadlier...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible fps. At 10 full pumps it couldn't even puncture a soda can consistently from 20ft. The effort to pump it 10 times is way too much, it feels like the gun will snap in half by pump 7. The grouping with the iron sights and my after market red dot scope are garbage (6-12 inches at 20 yds). I'd be more scared taking an airsoft gunshot at point blank tha this piece of junk...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but cheaply made and hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It looks neat, but as far as quality goes, it's absolute junk. It's made from really cheap junk plastic, and it really hard to pump because it's just shaped wrong for pumping. You constantly have to tilt it forward and side to side to get the BB's to go in their slots, and they back out when you move it around. Looking back, I would have just gotten a good, basic BB gun or pellet rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rifle for the for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice rifle to have for fun. It's pretty powerful even after one two or three pumps. The sight on it was a little off but when you realize how to set it properly you will be happy. I know there are alot of attachments you can buy for it and it's funny how my friend put his real AR-15 accessories on mine and it actually fit better than his.
customer_reviews.author: Montero

customer_reviews.title: For the order portion we got the order very quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: For the order portion we got the order very quickly no problems there but as soon as my son put the gun strap around him the strap was so flimsy it broke and broke the gun so now have to buy another and won't be repurchasing from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality issue with the sight/scope
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pump rifle that does well with bbs and pellets. The feel is sturdy and the accuracy is pretty good. Giving it 3 stars since the sight mount showed hairline fractures out of the box. Tried to call the warranty department but they were closed both times I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I love this M4 look alike
customer_reviews.text: I love this M4 look alike ! ... and shoots in tight groups too ... with a little muscle workout though due to multiple pumping ... but love it ... I added a sling and looked even better .... great wall decor too!
customer_reviews.author: williewyotech

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it just as much as my son!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son’s 8th birthday. He said it was the best gift ever. We used it right away and several times since. Seriously impressed with its accuracy and easy use. Nice to be able to shoot pellets and BB’s. Come see with a few targets, safety glasses, and enough pellets and BB’s to get shoot out of box. I have to admit I had just as much fun shooting it as my son did.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Best bb gun on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is nit your average bb gun. This is a great bb gun. High celocity and shoots true. Easy to use and the sights are adjustable. If yiur looking fir something with more bite thatn your average daisy bb gun, then this is yiur product
customer_reviews.author: kevin ward

customer_reviews.title: This Item constantly misfires
customer_reviews.text: This Item constantly misfires if my grandson had told me I would sent it back long long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Homer Bolden

customer_reviews.title: CROSMAN M4-.177 B-B & PELLET RIFLE
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED THE RIFLE & THE COVER FOR THE B-B's TO STAY IN WAS MISSING, CALLED THE FACTORY DIRECT & AFTER FINDING PART NUMBER, I RECEIVED THE COVER FOR FREE. I LOVE THE LOOKS & LIKE THE DOUBLE AMMO YOU CAN USE & SHOTS JUST FINE
customer_reviews.author: Pete K. Hentges

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not consistently accurate, but for the cost can’t beat it. Fun to shoot. Pro: Cheap, fun, accurate enough. Cons: Cheap, accurate enough. I read a lot of reviews before buying and for the most part they’re all true. The gun is made of plastic. So ya gotta be some what careful when handling it. I’m not saying it’s a carton of eggs, but you might not want to drop it. Also it says a minimum of 3 pumps. Well that’s still pretty powerful. It was going right through my target set up that consisted of 5 inches of cardboard and some styrofoam. All and all I like the gun.
customer_reviews.author: micheal hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Top Shooter
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, accurate and fun to shoot. I like that I can pump it four times for safe indoor shooting and up to ten times outdoors. A very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ironeyes4440

customer_reviews.title: Great bb rifle
customer_reviews.text: This will be for my son’s 5th birthday. I will be using this to teach him safe firearm handling as well as teaching him the responsibilities of using and owning a firearm. It is a bit on the heavy side for a 5 year old but we’ll be shooting from a bench and I’ll be doing the pumping. It seems to be built fairly well and I think it will be hold up for many years for our intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun training air gun...hard to sight in
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time sighting in this rifle using a Gamo reflex green dot and Game Red laser. Once I got it sighted in, its not too bad. Use 3 to 5 pumps for normal target shooting. Decent velocity. Be careful with the stock as it is fully plastic and not a true M4 stock. If it breaks, it has the same stock as many airsoft m4s.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Vaccaro

customer_reviews.title: Looks real enough to prevent theft.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have used it many times to scare the eff out of the meth head thieves in oakland. I even shot one in the face who was trying to steal my trailer. The cops don't love it but they cant do much cuz its legal in ca.
customer_reviews.author: evos scooters only repair

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and accurate but all plastic and seems fragile
customer_reviews.text: Pretty accurate right out of the box, has the picattiny rail so you can deck this out and add some nice little upgrades. The plastic feel of it is a little saddening but over all decent
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fun, accurate, and safe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice BB gun. Bought it for my grandson's birthday. We have only used it with BB's so far, but have been very satisfied with the performance. It comes with a 5 shot "clip" for pellets also. Only shoots one BB at a time and loading each BB individually is a little complicated until you get used to it. Very safe and very accurate. Very fun. Only con: We bought a Crossman red dot sight to add to the upper rail but it does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but not made well. Hard to pump.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me. It's too hard for me to use. I'm not strong enough to use it. It has already broken. It looks cool but does not work well. Hard to pump. The butt stock broke off a few months after we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Poore

customer_reviews.title: Great B.B. gun.
customer_reviews.text: Great B.B. gun for shooting at cans and other targets. I didn’t enjoy pellets out of it, clip only holds 5 pellets and the whole process of loading the pellets into clip and chambering the pellet just isn’t worth it. I only use it to shot bbs which is fine with me and the loading and chambering when using bbs is very simple and quick. Overall it’s well worth 50 or 60 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: A 7 year old's dream
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old boy loves this gun. He is able to load it by himself and it's the perfect length for him, but also works perfectly for his older friends that come over.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: The cocking mechanism broke on 3rd shot. Returning for refund and getting a differant brand.
customer_reviews.author: CHRONO

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with all the parts and pieces. Was a gift and didn't get opened until after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: wwarrenc

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheap, but still fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for family use due to adjustability and I thought was kind of cool looking. Sights are pretty poor for accuracy and overall kind of cheap and plasticy. I like my more traditional models better for fit and finish and overall shoot-ability, but they are boring to look at. As many mention pump is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eone

customer_reviews.title: The butt is made from cheap, brittle plastic, ...
customer_reviews.text: The butt is made from cheap, brittle plastic, it broke apart when I was attaching it. It does still shoot though, and the recoil was never really a big enough problem to ever need the butt anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremey P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as a bb gun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as a bb gun. I like the fact that you have to go through 3 steps before shooting once...nice way to train my grandson in how to handle a weapon before he graduates to a .22
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel slayer
customer_reviews.text: If you can pump, aim, and fire, this BB gun will slay you a nice tree squirrel or ground squirrel for dinner. No need to buy food storage, purchase yourself a this sweet air rifle and you’re prepared for the zombie apocalypse!
customer_reviews.author: StefanieTyler

customer_reviews.title: Needs an orange tip
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for helping the kids get used to aiming. We shoot from the tree house down at a 45 degree angle with the garage as a backstop. Down side, it looks very real. Was a bit worried my crazy neighbor was going to call the police when he saw my 9yr old shooting what is a dead ringer for an M4.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing gun I love the weight to it, it looks like and feels like a real rifle, the magazine is easy to take out, the butt of the rifle I love how its an option to stick out, and the pump is really easy to load
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun from a cheap air gun
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Gun is holding up well so far (~500 pellets shot). It is mostly plastic but no breaks or cracks so far. Accuracy is way better than I expected from a $50 gun, and the kids also enjoy shooting it. I added a red dot for $16 and a bipod for $18... gun is even better now.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great First Airgun for New Shooter
customer_reviews.text: Love that you have the ability to use BBs for all-day economical shooting but have the option of loading pellets for better accuracy and harder hitting to knock down those pesky soda cans. Pump action gives you the ability to control the power level so that you can shoot in the garage or the backyard... and you won’t have to keep buying Co2 cartridges. Lots of fun for not a lot of money... and greater satisfaction than pretending on a video game console!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Did not include all pieces
customer_reviews.text: My unit did not include a storage magazine, deliever within two days and I will change the review.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Poteet

customer_reviews.title: Nice gun fun to shoot made of hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: I really like this gun. If a fun gun for plinking in the yard and looks cool. Only down side is it's pretty much all plastic. I just wish it was more like my airsoft AR that's made almost entirely of metal and comes apart like the real thing
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Crosman M4-177
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. It is plastic. Hold it by the grip when you pump it and you won’t have an issue with the butt stock breaking. I have had zero issues. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Soltis

customer_reviews.title: Great pump BB gun
customer_reviews.text: Fairly accurate Great feel for a BB gun. Shoots ammo at a great fast speed for a small pump gun great price
customer_reviews.author: Oman

customer_reviews.title: Fun  to shoot.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: Fun to shoot Great price. I did buy a scope for it as I got old and can't see as well as I used to!
customer_reviews.author: John C. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good BB gun pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good BB gun pellet gun. Getting the BB's from the magazine to the chamber is a bit of a challenge but it has great power and it's built well. The only issue is the stock or butt breaks off from the gun easily.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  unit
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect. Only one suggestion, pellet holder for 10 would be better option .
customer_reviews.author: WI

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! It feels heavy
customer_reviews.text: The M-4 177 has surpassed my expectations! Looks great! It feels heavy, just like the real thing. Have already attached a red dot HUD site. Will be sighting it in as soon as the weather permits.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design and Poor Material Quality.
customer_reviews.text: received the air rifle but when i went to use it the part of the barrel that comes out the pumping stock was cracked making the air rifle useless to use because the pump would keep falling down after i would pump it up but amazon took care of the situation by replacing it with a different air rifle i would not recommend buying this it has to many defaults in the design and the type of material it is made out of.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: My grandson said, "Beto" wasn't going to get his rifle!!!...A wise boy...it must skip a generation..! Eyes and locked and loaded...
customer_reviews.author: William L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who loves BB guns and he says it works great. The accuracy is great and he loves shooting it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This gun reminds me of my childhood and even works like my old bb gun when I was a kid my son loves it and won't turn it loose so I thinks it's a great bb gun
customer_reviews.author: Katerina Jinks

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: This gun is awesome it looks real, it holds plenty of bb's and pellets. The aiming is a little off but you can fix it. It's a pump action so it gets tiring lol. Shoots pretty far as well it's sort of hard finding the right attachments though .
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: They were so excited and they loved the quality of the guns
customer_reviews.text: I bought these rifles as Christmas gifts for my teenage grandsons and when they opened them they went ballistic. They were so excited and they loved the quality of the guns. They are still firing away at the targets that were supplied.
customer_reviews.author: colin gault

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: This was a second rifle because the first one I received was busted and the rear sight aperture had the sights on backwards. The one I received the second time was exactly as described. It was easy to put together and works like a champ. It took a bit to adjust the sights to hit center mass but they got there.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Clark

customer_reviews.title: The best gun for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gun for the money. I've put about 700 rounds thru this gun and love it. Its fairly accurate right out of the box after mounting the sights, minor adjustments required. The gun looks good, just wish there was a little more metal to it. Highly recommend, you can't go wrong with this gun!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cool. Does BBs/Pellets.
customer_reviews.text: Great rifle for a first air gun. Got it for my 10 year old for Christmas and he loves it. The look is fairly realistic, so it feels pretty cool when shooting. It is a bit hard to pump and he has complained that it hurts his hands, but this is only minor and I think he'll grow into it. For the price, it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: so i would recommend when cocking not to keep stock underneath your arm ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second m4-177 I added a red dot sight to gun and it is dead on every time, the first one I purchased the stock ended up breaking , so i would recommend when cocking not to keep stock underneath your arm pit area , as it seems to stress the stock.
customer_reviews.author: chris robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This gun was a lot of fun for about 2 weeks until the cheap plastic buttstock bracket broke into 3 pieces. Very disappointed in the cheaper quality Crosman chose for these newer airguns. I have a 1980s powermaster that still works perfectly. It's unfortunate they don't make their products like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Front sight bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice riffle, shoots well. Front side post is not the one that they promised. They promise one that you can raise or lower. Instead they send a piece of cheap plastic. I'm having trouble zeroing the BB gun. I had to spend more money in order to buy something to zero this BB gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with anything listed in description Includes 100 Premium Copperhead BB's, 100 Pellets, shooting glasses, 5 paper targets and a dual-aperture windage and elevations adjustable carry handle
customer_reviews.author: charles b.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great price works awesome way better then expected! Great job
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Best budget air gun for game
customer_reviews.text: Great rifle for very small game plinking. It is made of all plastic exterior but it feels solid with little to no play on all parts. Pros: Cheap price Adequate fps for small game Large BB reservoir Rifled barrel Fake magazine perfect for extra clips Con: Made of plastic (expected at this price point) 10 pumps instead of break barrel Iron sights hard to sight in All together, this is the best $60 air rifle you can get. Works wonderfully with a cheap scope from walmart. Excellent sized groups from 20 yards away.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shootable replica!
customer_reviews.text: Not bought to shoot, but just because it was neat (and highly recommended in Firearms News!) Great toy! Realistic war-gamer for little money. Only gave four starts because some may prefer break action and higher fps capability. I mean, it's really a BB gun.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work like it should it’s only good for about 30 feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work like it should it’s only good for about 30 feet and that’s only because I figured it out it’s hard to site
customer_reviews.author: Michael y.

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE
customer_reviews.text: BE AWARE.. DID NOT COME WITH THE MAGAZINE NOR THE SIGHT MOUNT. By the looks of the pictures it looks like people are getting sight mount and magazines. I did not get neither and it also looked used. I am returning for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus L

customer_reviews.title: Trigger broke...
customer_reviews.text: The trigger had broken off within an hour of use. On the bright side,it shot pretty accurately at 10 yards, Pumping felt good and the gun itself felt sturdy. Maybe I just got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid. Looks like a real ar15 but smaller and lighter. Cool gun
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to practice shooting with my son and to teach proper gun handling. It seems to be fairly accurate for a bb gun, better than some others I have shot. The overall quality for the price isn't bad either. I would Recommend it. We also had a fun time spray painting the gun it came out pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I installed a red dot aight on it. It is quite accurate with the stock sights however. Seems to be well made and have had no issues. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jeff h

customer_reviews.title: A great pump pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: This gun is a ton of fun. I love that the stock adjusts so my 11 and 9 year old can begin holding their shooting skills. The tactical sights are great... But today I installed a variable power scope and was able to pop can 28 of 30 shots from about 30 yards. I am more than pleased with this rifle and considering the other which resembles the SCAR.
customer_reviews.author: Stormchaser.johnson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok. The only issue the bb's sometime get stuck and nothing comes out..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I like the air gun. It will get the job done. Rats in Baltimore are no joke.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: But I like the idea that the gun may be too complicated ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves it and it works without any issues. It is a little complicated to work compared to other models. But I like the idea that the gun may be too complicated for him to load/operate on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Boy likes it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a scope for the top and other accessories and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: D DEATLEY

customer_reviews.title: Stocks broke on both with very little use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my kids and both stocks have broke after very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Long

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I put a decent scope and red dot on this and it is very nice. I can hit a nickel every shot at 10 yards. This is about the best pellet rifle I have ever owned for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Darth

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! This is as cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!! This is as cheap as it looks !!! Went to shoot the pellets and one got stuck. Couldn't get it out. Tried to take the gun apart and parts went flying everywhere. So threw the gun away and bought a different one at an actual gun store.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN SHERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Did not work after shooting two or three pellets at ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work after shooting two or three pellets at a paper target, returned product shortly after receiving, very disappointing need to find new way to dispatch rabbits quietly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, had it for over a year and haven't had a single problem so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: The original sights were cracked, the replacement sights were cracked! The THIRD sights are so far out that I can't sight the piece of crap in. They are adjusted all the way up and all the way to the right and STILL 6 inches off at 100 feet. It's JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This gun is awesome. I bought it for my son's Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This gun is awesome. I bought it for my son's Christmas present. He is 12 and has alot of trouble pumping the rifle, but I feel that he will get stronger as he uses the gun. It has a lot of force behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a very nice air rifle I can use for some indoor shooting practice down in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: David L McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Great BB gun for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cool BB gun but took me a minute on how to load a bb to fire it. It recommends 3 pumps for every shot and that can get tiring after a while. My daughter that's 8 can't pump it yet but maybe after it's broken in it will become easier.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fires 1 at a time, with 5 shot clips for easy loading. Pump action, 3 Times is good for targets, up to 10 pumps max for small animals etc. I paid $50, works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: not as much power as my old one, when it was woring
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It has a very powerful shot and good accuracy. We purchased it for our son and he seems to really like it. He is only allowed to use it with supervision because, as I said before, it does have a powerful shot and we do not want him to shoot his eye out.
customer_reviews.author: Swi

customer_reviews.title: Great air rifle
customer_reviews.text: This air rifle doesn't just look awesome, it's also really accurate. You can hit a dime at 30yrds with just the iron sights!
customer_reviews.author: Calicojack

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pump.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to pump. And in order for you to shoot pellets, the BB chamber needs to be empty. Only 5 pellets will load at a time. It looks like a AK47, so, we shoot only in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fun and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Accurate as can be from 15 yards I can hit a soda can 9 our of 10 times. That one miss I'm sure are my own shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Family (safety first)
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy action. 10 pumps will exceed your expectations; very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: PantherCityDJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to cock the gun
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for 11 yr old grandson. So hard for him to cock it. Shouldn't be that difficult.
customer_reviews.author: KatMil

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter
customer_reviews.text: Quite accurate for a gun in this price range, I am totally satisfied with the gun, very fun to play with
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson for his 10th birthday. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo S

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, accurate, pump bb/pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good shooting pump bb/pellet gun for the price. It is accurate right out of the box and is just as described. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Crosman m4
customer_reviews.text: I am injoying the m4 so much I’m ready to order a second 1 for my son Because he injoys shooting it
customer_reviews.author: bluewaterbeats

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rifle that has held up for a long time
customer_reviews.text: My boys and I love this rifle. We had put hundreds of BBs and pelets through it and it is still in fantastic condition. Very powerful and accurate. Looks awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks real in dark plces. CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: Solid gun.. On sight w/ one eye. Worx for me... Pellets & BBs Sweet Toy. Thanx MJL
customer_reviews.author: michaeljohn

customer_reviews.title: Fun to shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Fun for shooting bbs in the yard with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Miller

product_meta.title: Crosman M4-177 Tactical Style Bolt Action Variable Pump .177-Caliber Pellet And BB Air Rifle
product_meta.description: The Crosman M4-177 is the next great variable pump air rifle. With easy-to-use variable pump features you can control your power from 350 fps to 700 fps for everything from plinking to pest control. This tactical-styled repeater shoots BBs or .177-caliber pellets and comes with a dual-aperture rear sight and adjustable post front sight to help you stay on target. Offering a rifled steel barrel with crossbolt safety and adjustable stock to fit every shooter. "Take It Outside" with Crosman
feature_bullets: DURABLE, WATER RESISTANT SYNTHETIC DESIGN - Tactical style in black with rifled rifled steel barrel
VARIABLE CONTROL - From 350 fps to 700 fps
COMPATIBLE WITH .177-CALIBER PELLETS OR TRADITIONAL STEEL BBs
CROSSBOLT SAFETY - To ensure proper and safe handling
IDEAL FOR PLINKING, PEST CONTROL, TARGET SHOOTING AND SKILL DEVELOPMENT
Includes a Crosman Firepow'r 5-shot pellet clip and the BB reservoir holds up to 350
Adjustable stock, loop slots for a sling, dual aperture rear sight with windage & elevation adjustments
Removeable magazine stores pellet clip and sight adjustment tool
Accessory rails for mounting scope, lasers, flashlights, cameras
Shoots pellets up to 600 FPS and BBs 625 FPS
